_header: My death my judge in heaven and hell
Subjects: advice, spiritual; precepts; death, approach of
_description: Advice to live well — five couplets

CamStJohn195.First Lines:
My death my Iudg in heaven & hellremember thes ffovr & ever
                    doe well…
CamStJohn195.Last Lines:
…See that which is good saye that which is truecherishe old
                    ffrendes & chaunge for noe newe
